verbs.name: look
verbs.code:
output = [c $here.name, 'yellow bold']
output.push $here.prop 'description'
output.push c 'You see here:', 'cyan'
for item in $here.contents()
  output.push c item.name, 'cyan'
$player.send output.join '\n'

verbs.name: get
verbs.code:
if $this.location() == $player
  $player.send "You're already holding the #{$this.name}."
else
  $this.moveTo $player
  $player.send "You pick up the #{$this.name}."

verbs.name: drop
verbs.code:
if $this.location() == $player
  $this.moveTo $here
  $player.send "You drop the #{$this.name}."
else
  $player.send "You're not holding the #{$this.name}."

properties.value: The forest thins out here a bit.

verbs.name: swing
verbs.code:
if $this.location() == $player
  $player.send "You swing the wooden sword around. You look a bit silly."
else
  $player.send "You're not holding the sword."
